help.title: Help
help.a1: RaiAI is a smart farming assistant made for Thai farmers. It helps you scan plant diseases, check the weather, and see crop prices. This website shows a demo — for full features, download the RaiAI mobile app.
help.a2: Yes — RaiAI is free to use during the trial period, on both web and mobile. In the future, optional premium tools (like advanced alerts) may be added.
help.a3: The web version is a demo showing how RaiAI works. Some results are mock examples, not real detections. For real, accurate weather, photo analysis, and local advice, please use the RaiAI mobile app.
help.a4: Yes — the web version needs an internet connection. However, in the RaiAI mobile app, some features work offline, like viewing saved forecasts or your field data.
help.a5: Right now, RaiAI can scan rice and durian leaves for disease, pest, or nutrient issues. More crops (like mango, cassava, and palm) will be added soon.
help.a6: RaiAI works on most Android phones (version 9 and above) — OPPO, Vivo, Samsung, Xiaomi, etc. An iPhone version will be available later.
help.note: This website is a demo version
